title: Frontend Development:
description: I specialize in React.js and Next.js, building fast, scalable, and responsive web applications that deliver great user experiences.

title: UI/UX Implementation:
description: I turn design ideas into real, user-friendly websites that look good and are simple to navigate.

title: Reusable Components
description: I create pieces of code that can be used again in different parts of the project, saving time and effort.

title: Responsive & SEO-Optimized
description: I make sure websites work well on all devices (phones, tablets, computers) and are easy to find on search engines like Google.
